subject: Climate & Environment
title: Countries Leading the Transition
description: A quick win: understand Countries Leading the Transition.

hook.text: Iceland runs almost entirely on renewable energy. Geothermal and hydro do the heavy lifting.

buildup.text: Costa Rica has generated over 98% of its electricity from renewables for years.

discovery.text: Denmark exports surplus wind power to neighbors and aims for 100% renewables by 2030.

twist.text: China installs more solar each year than the rest of the world combined.
